page.title: 18Community Clubs. Kingswood.
page.content: One typical club,{The British Legion {Club,}provides weekly activities for ex-servicemen and women. A weekly programme of{social}events is organised and the club is well supported throughout the week particularly when professional artistes are employed. The{Staple Hill {and District branch}is responsible for the annual{Poppy Day Appeal}in the area and in 1984 raise Â£7068 out of a national total of Â£7,363,439.{Page {Community}and{Downend Folk House {Association}arrange various activit for the{communities}of Staple Hill and Downend. The activities are arranged to suit all age groups and to include the{handicapped.}Activities include Slimming Clubs, Wheelchair Dancing and the meetings of the {Downend Local History Society.
